reviewtext: I was hoping these headphones would sound like the Panasonic RP-HG10 headphones I have used for years and years.  They have been discontinued, and were one of the absolute best headphones I have ever used, even though they were cheapo $10 ones.  Unfortunately, thesePanasonic RP-HT21 Lightweight Headphones with XBS Portdo not sound anything like the RP-HG10 model, and don't even strike me as being made for music.  They also don't fit flat on the ears.  I think they would be best as computer headphones when watching news videos and such online.
